I am Rajat Bhageria

The ambitious Founder and CEO of CafeMocha.org
I study at University of Pennsylvania

WHAT IS CAFEMOCHA.ORG?

A FULLY ENGAGED PUBLISHING SOCIAL-NETWORK

Publish

CafeMocha allows young authors and writers to publish their creative writing on the web for people to see.

Share

Authors can share their creative works with worldwide friends and receive feedback.

Improve

Professionals can recruit writers on CafeMocha and young writers can build up an online reputation.

Click here to visit CafeMocha.org

Watch this Video to find out more!
